00001 /*! \file membus.c \brief Software-driven Memory Bus for ARMmini-LPC210x. */

00020 //*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022 #include "lpc210x.h"
00023 #include "global.h"
00024 #include "timer.h"
00025 #include "membus.h"
00026 
00027 void membusInit(void)
00028 {
00029     // setup I/O lines
00030     IOCLR = MEMBUS_LATCH;
00031     IOSET = MEMBUS_nRD;
00032     IOSET = MEMBUS_nWR;
00033     // set inputs
00034     IODIR &= ~P015;
00035     // set outputs
00036     IODIR |= (MEMBUS_IO | MEMBUS_LATCH | MEMBUS_nRD | MEMBUS_nWR);
00037 
00038 }
00039 
00040 uint16_t membusRead(uint16_t addr)
00041 {
00042     uint16_t data;
00043 
00044     // switch bus to output
00045     IODIR |= MEMBUS_IO;
00046     // assert address
00047     IOCLR = MEMBUS_IO;
00048     IOSET = addr<<16;
00049     // latch address
00050     IOSET = MEMBUS_LATCH;
00051     // delay
00052     MEMBUS_DELAY;
00053     IOCLR = MEMBUS_LATCH | MEMBUS_IO;
00054     
00055     // switch bus to input
00056     IODIR &= ~MEMBUS_IO;
00057     // assert read
00058     IOCLR = MEMBUS_nRD;
00059     // delay
00060     MEMBUS_DELAY;
00061     // read in data
00062     data = IOPIN>>16;
00063     // release read
00064     IOSET = MEMBUS_nRD;
00065     
00066     return data;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void membusWrite(uint16_t addr, uint16_t data)
00070 {
00071     // switch bus to output
00072     IODIR |= MEMBUS_IO;
00073     // assert address
00074     IOCLR = MEMBUS_IO;
00075     IOSET = addr<<16;
00076     // latch address
00077     IOSET = MEMBUS_LATCH;
00078     // delay
00079     MEMBUS_DELAY;
00080     IOCLR = MEMBUS_LATCH | MEMBUS_IO;
00081     
00082     // output data
00083     IOCLR = MEMBUS_IO;
00084     IOSET = ((uint32_t)data)<<16;
00085     // assert write
00086     IOCLR = MEMBUS_nWR;
00087     // delay
00088     MEMBUS_DELAY;
00089     // release write
00090     IOSET = MEMBUS_nWR;
00091 }
